titleStmt.title: The time-troubler crept in at the window, disturbing and molesting the Church of God, by false heresies and ill opinions, sprung from his stirill braine, sowne by the devill, reapt by his wicked heart, put into the barne of his evill conscience. Discussed of betweene two loving friends, R. and L. this present yeere, 1642. Wondering at the time.
